name: Adventures of Asa: Pizza Party
description:
Asa Derro bought some pizza for her party later today. Upon arriving, she realizes she may have dropped some slices along the way. Hidden throughout the Winter Forrest of Capon, can you help Asa recover them? What secrets await for you? Wait... why are their chickens spread across the trail? 

Enjoy the demo.  Thanks all!

INSTRUCTIONS:

[WASD] to move, hold [Shift] to sprint, press [space] to jump, and [mouse-click] to attack.
